text:
I need to set the Id and Type attributes in the DSIGReference element, as described in xmldsig-core specification (see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/#sec-Reference). At the moment i am interating trought the child elements of the signature node created with createBlankSignature().

It would be a great help for me if you can add some setId and setType functions to the DSIGReference class.
creator: patrick.hagelkruys@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 25435
DSIGReference.hpp with setId and setType functions
creator: patrick.hagelkruys@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 25436
DSIGReference.cpp with setId and setType functions
creator: patrick.hagelkruys@gmail.com

text:
Sorry, I have not seen that the Type attribute already can be set by DSIGReference::createBlankReference(URI,hashAlgorithmURI,type). I was looking for that about 2 days and have not seen it, maybe i should go for holidays.

So I only miss the Id function.
creator: patrick.hagelkruys@gmail.com

text: Works for me, thank you very much for adding this functions.
creator: patrick.hagelkruys@gmail.com
